message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I know you've been interested in. I'm asking for $12,000 for it.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to come down to $9,000.  How about we split the difference and go with $10,500?  That seems like a fair compromise considering the value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet in the middle again?
